=============
Administrator
=============

Administrator - is a jam.py web application intended for application development 
and database administration.

To run Administrator go to a Web browser and type in the browser address bar 

.. code-block:: console

    127.0.0.1:8080/admin.html

.. note::

    Please note that application.py must be running
    
After Administrator is started in a Web browser the following page will appear:


.. image:: _images/admin.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Jam.py Administaor


On the left side of Administrator page there is a panel that contains a project 
tree. By selecting any node of the project tree, as a rule, we open it's content 
in the center part of Administrator page, and in the bottom and right side of 
Administrator can be buttons that allow us to modify it's content.
    

To see the changes made in Administrator go to the Project page and reload it 
(press F5).
